original_title: The Love That Dare Not Speak Its Name
overview: This film follows the lives of 6 gay women in London and Southampton, England, including singer Saffron Summerfield, who is still singing today. The film is very upfront about their lives and sexuality and all interviews are done full face to camera with no veils. Despite all the advances, much of their experience still holds true today.
title: The Love That Dare Not Speak Its Name
